'''''Beyond Bree'' December 1986''' is an issue of ''[[Beyond Bree]]'', edited by [[Nancy Martsch]].

The article "Attacks of Taste" by [[Wayne G. Hammond]] reprints [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s statement from ''[[Attacks of Taste]]'' concerning his reading habits as a teenager. See page 6.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
